name: Mumen Rider Deck
author: Werd Web Dev
description: Epic Duels–compatible deck for Mumen Rider (One Punch Man).

cards.name: Justice Crash
cards.rulesText: Leap 3 squares and deal 4 damage to an adjacent enemy.

cards.name: Shield of Sacrifice
cards.rulesText: Move 1 square and give an adjacent ally Armor and Fortified.

cards.name: Stand Firm
cards.rulesText: Push each adjacent enemy 1 square and you gain Focused.

cards.name: Solo Patrol
cards.rulesText: Move up to 6 squares ignoring terrain and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Against All Odds
cards.rulesText: If no allies are within 4 squares, draw 2 cards and gain Empowered.

cards.name: Determined Ride
cards.rulesText: Heal 3 HP and move 2 squares; if your HP is ≤ half, heal 5 instead.

cards.name: Never Give Up
cards.rulesText: Cancel an attack against you and move 2 squares.

cards.name: Last Stand
cards.rulesText: Deal 5 damage to the enemy that reduced you below 5 HP this round.

cards.name: Inspire Hope
cards.rulesText: Allies within 3 squares heal 2 HP and gain Focused.

cards.name: Cyclone Sweep
cards.rulesText: Move through up to 3 enemies; each takes 3 damage.

cards.name: Ride Through Pain
cards.rulesText: Remove all negative conditions from yourself and gain Regenerating.

cards.name: Defender's Heart
cards.rulesText: Give an adjacent ally Empowered and pull yourself 2 squares toward them.

cards.name: Ride of Justice
cards.rulesText: Teleport anywhere, then deal 4 damage to up to three enemies and all allies heal 2 HP.

cards.name: Quick U-Turn
cards.rulesText: Swap places with an enemy within 3 squares; that enemy is Stunned.
